Title: [G-07] Use short reason strings can save gas
Content:
*Note: Minor optimation, the amount of gas saved is minor, change when you see fit.* Every reason string takes at least 32 bytes. Use short reason strings that fits in 32 bytes or it will become more expensive. Instances include: [StakingRewards.sol#L179-L182](https://github.com/code-423n4/2022-02-concur/blob/72b5216bfeaa7c52983060ebfc56e72e0aa8e3b0/contracts/StakingRewards.sol#L179-L182)
```solidity require( block.timestamp > periodFinish, "Previous rewards period must be complete before changing the duration for the new period" ); ``` [StakingRewards.sol#L191-L194](https://github.com/code-423n4/2022-02-concur/blob/72b5216bfeaa7c52983060ebfc56e72e0aa8e3b0/contracts/StakingRewards.sol#L191-L194)
```solidity require( block.timestamp > periodFinish, "Previous rewards period must be complete before changing the duration for the new period" ); ``` [StakingRewards.sol#L137-L140](https://github.com/code-423n4/2022-02-concur/blob/72b5216bfeaa7c52983060ebfc56e72e0aa8e3b0/contracts/StakingRewards.sol#L137-L140)
```solidity require( msg.sender == rewardsDistribution, "Caller is not RewardsDistribution contract" ); ``` [StakingRewards.sol#L170-L173](https://github.com/code-423n4/2022-02-concur/blob/72b5216bfeaa7c52983060ebfc56e72e0aa8e3b0/contracts/StakingRewards.sol#L170-L173)
```solidity require( tokenAddress != address(stakingToken), "Cannot withdraw the staking token" ); ``` [MasterChef.sol#L210-L210](https://github.com/code-423n4/2022-02-concur/blob/72b5216bfeaa7c52983060ebfc56e72e0aa8e3b0/contracts/MasterChef.sol#L210-L210)
```solidity require(transferSuccess, "safeConcurTransfer: transfer failed"); ```
